setup_script_description: sets focus on the first tab
task: read information about tab in tab list
specific_user_instruction: With the reading cursor on the 'Nils Frahm' tab, read information about the tab.
output_assertions: State of the tab, 'selected', is conveyed
Position of tab in the tab list, 1, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
